entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and student who has a dream diary. He is being questioned by Professor McGonagall about his progress on it.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is the Transfiguration professor and Head of Gryffindor House. She is asking Harry to show her his dream diary.

entities.name: harry's dreams
entities.description: Harry's dreams are being interpreted by Professor McGonagall in front of the class.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is the Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher. She is making notes on her clipboard.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who has just had his dreams interpreted by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and classmate. He is telling Hermione about what happened in Divination.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who has been in Arithmancy. She is being told by Ron and Harry about what happened in Divination.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall interprets Harry's dreams at the top of her voice.
Professor Umbridge is making notes on her clipboard.
